name: Xonotic (itch) (RPHULK48)
description: Xonotic is a simple first person shooter I am delighted to release it on itch go to original site xonotic.org .  You can play it single player as well as multiplayer. Single player consists of bots which at hard level can be tough to deal and they observe you and can copy your moves. The number of maps are good enough to last long and you can even let the game to choose level for you. This game can even be played with touchpad. Simply extract the zip folder and open xonotic file in its subfolder and enjoy.
